span.span: Gets or sets the default for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含指定的映像和標籤控制項相關聯的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 如果屬性未設定功能區控制項，屬性代替。If the property is not set for a ribbon control, the property is used instead. 預設控制項大小的定義根據控制項的屬性設定。The default control size definition is based on the control's property settings. 如果指定時，它是預設值。If a is specified, it is the default. 如果已`null`，以及指定，則是預設值。If is `null`, and a is specified, the is the default. 如果兩個並會`null`，映像設定為預設。If both the and are `null`, the image is set to by default. 如果屬性為 null 或空白，則預設為隱藏。If the property is null or empty, it is hidden by default. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

related.span: 功能區配置和調整大小

span.span: Gets or sets the for this control when it is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含指定的映像和標籤控制項相關聯的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 此屬性會指定如何映像標籤就會顯示與此控制項裝載於快速存取工具列。This property specifies how the image and label will appear when this control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.

span.span: Gets a reference to the that this control belongs to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定父代上控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷類別。It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否顯示控制項的鍵盤焦點視覺化樣式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether to show the keyboard focus visual for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ShowKeyboardCuesProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。
取得或設定顯示於控制項的影像，此時的影像大小設定為 。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control when the image size is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

related.span: 功能區配置和調整大小

Public Shared ReadOnly SmallImageSourceProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。
取得或設定顯示在這個控制項工具提示中的描述性文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果設定屬性，則不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示; 將改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ToolTipDescriptionProperty As DependencyProperty
